name: Learning Resources Botley 2.0 The Coding Robot Classroom Set - STEM Toys, Robotics Kit, Critical Thinking, Science Activities for Boys and Girls
short_description: STEM TOY FOR ALL AGES: Botley 2.0 enhances logical reasoning, problem-solving abilities, and spatial awareness with intuitive controls and expanded coding styles even preschoolers can master

CODE, CREATE, COLLABORATE: This robot toy encourages coders to be curious, with activity cards, obstacle course pieces, and "secret codes" to transform Botley into a train, police car, ghost, and more

product_description: Looking for a classroom resource to teach kids coding? Meet Botley 2.0, 2019's Innovative Toy of the Year and our smartest coding robot for kids yet! This interactive toy robot knows multiple ways to code right out of the box - all screen-free and accessible to preschoolers and beyond. How does Botley 2.0 grow alongside students? Advanced programming features like object detection, light and sound sequences, 45-degree turns, and 150-step programming capabilities provide progressive learning opportunities for multiple skill levels. This classroom set is great for group learning and teaching environments as students work together to plan, code, and execute complex challenges. Comes with two Botley 2.0s, two Botley 2.0 78-piece Activity Sets, and two Botley Accessory Sets (Action Challenge and Crashin' Construction), all powered by AAA batteries (not included).

name: ACEBOTT Smart Robot Car Kit Compatible with Arduino, Robotics for Kids Ages 8-12 12-16, Electronic Programming Project/STEM Science Kits Coding Gifts for Adults and Youths
short_description: Beginner-friendly: The ACEBOTT smart robot car kit is controlled by an advanced ESP32 controller board, making programming easy. Through 16 story-rich tutorials, students will systematically master the principles of programming and electronic hardware, and easily master the mysteries of the smart car. (The robot kit does not include batteries)

Rich Expandability: ACEBOTT based on the classic omnidirectional mecanum wheel robot car kit, we have added a rich set of expansion packs that can be freely matched: camera expansion pack, robotic arm expansion pack, tank expansion pack, solar expansion pack. Whether it is App and IR remote control, photo taking, image recognition, voice recognition, tracking mode, shooting, or multi-degree-of-freedom robotic arms, etc., the STEM robot kit will satisfy your desire for exploration and unleash your creativity!

All-round control: This ACEBOTT coding robot for kids is equipped with advanced 6cm omnidirectional Mecanum wheels, also known as omnidirectional wheels or lion wheels, which can easily achieve 360° movement in any direction, support multiple movement modes (forward, sideways, diagonal, rotation), and can complete difficult actions such as left and right drifting, and easily cross any position, including narrow bends, narrow alleys, and intricate roads.

Multi-way Cruise & Multi-direction Obstacle Avoidance: Accurate multi-way cruise allows the rc control car to easily plan the path and realize autonomous navigation; multi-direction obstacle avoidance allows flexible response in the face of obstacles; the new follow mode allows the car to always follow your steps.

IR remote Control and App Control: Allows children to control this robotics kit through the IR remote control and App, make you enjoy the fun and convenience of intelligent technology. Simply master all the actions of the car with just one touch.

STEM Education Kit: The ACEBOTT coding robot kits provides an excellent platform for STEM education with its easy-to-program ESP32 controller, rich functional expansion and all-round control design, helping students master programming, electronic hardware principles and robotics technology through practical operating systems, and stimulate creativity and problem-solving skills. It is the prefect Christmas gift for programming enthusiasts and teenagers.

name: Learning Resources Coding Critters Ranger & Zip,22 Piece Set, Ages 4+, Screen-Free Early Coding Toy for Kids, Interactive STEM Coding Pet, Gifts for Boys and Girls
short_description: EARLY CODING SKILLS: Code along with your first coding friends and their screen-free storybook coding adventure
PLAY MODE: Play fetch, hide and seek, and more with brave Ranger and mischievous Zip
KID CODING ROBOT: Design your own endless coding challenges with the 22-piece pet Playset. REAL PET PLAY: Feed, pet, and take care of your interactive pets in play mode
Super STEM Skills: From science and technology to engineering and math, STEM learning help kids build critical thinking and other skills they need for success in school and beyond!

GIVE THE GIFT OF LEARNING: Whether you’re shopping for holidays, birthdays, or just because, toys from Learning Resources help you discover new learning fun every time you give a gift! Ideal gift for Halloween, Christmas, Stocking Stuffers, Easter Baskets Stuffers or even for Homeschool.
product_description: Transform playtime into early STEM education with Coding Critters Ranger & Zip! This innovative set introduces preschoolers to programming concepts without screens through interactive storytelling adventures. Children use directional buttons on Ranger's back to code sequences up to 30 steps, teaching logical thinking and problem-solving skills. The magnetic connection between Ranger and Zip creates engaging scenarios where kids program rescue missions, games of fetch, and exploration adventures. With included accessories like slides, seesaws, and obstacles, young learners design custom coding challenges while developing spatial reasoning and sequential thinking. Perfect for quiet indoor activities and rainy day entertainment, this award-winning educational toy grows with children from simple directional commands to complex multi-step programming sequences. Whether used for independent discovery or collaborative learning, Coding Critters makes abstract coding concepts tangible through beloved pet characters that respond to every programmed command.

Like all of ThinkFun's games, Hacker is built to develop critical thinking skills.
